channel.title: Amy McFarlane on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Amy McFarlane on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: ISBA 2016: The shifting sector - Amy MacFarlane
item.description: DM - Donald Macleod AM - Amy McFarlane DM My pleasure it is now to introduce Amy MacFarlane, who is the Chief Executive and founder of Recreation Respite Canada. As a provider of creative and flexible respite services, Amy will tell us about the latest developments in policy and practice in Canada and how this is changing people’s expectations of where, when and how respite services are delivered. Amy will share her views on the need for traditional services to become more entrepreneurial and collaborative in their approach to service development and what this means in terms of new business skills and tools.
